title: Textile, "Pebble Beach", 1974
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: screen printed using three screens
inscribed: at edge, " PEBBLE BEACH hand printed by ELENHANK DESIGNERS, Inc. "
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 325 x 139 cm (10 ft. 7 15/16 in. x 54 3/4 in.)
Repeat H: 76.2 cm (30 in.)
creditline: Gift of Henry C. and Eleanor Kluck
description: Circles arranged in wavy lines as on a beach when the tide is out. Blck, brown and yellow on white.
